author: bencomic

left.text: sounds like she's an idiot, yeah. you may want to have her put down

right.text: the worst is she spread it all over this door that's like.. i don't know, it's like blinds i guess? it's wooden and there's a bunch of slits in it. that's going to be impossible to clean

left.text: just rub her nose in it

right.text: she was trying to protect your firstborn

left.text: she just misinterpreted the passover myth, that's all

title: SHE WHO SMEARED IT REARED IT: Part 2
